chezmoi managed
cmpenv stdout golden/managed

chezmoi --include=all managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-all

chezmoi --include=absent managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-absent

chezmoi --include=dirs managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-dirs

chezmoi --include=files managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-files

chezmoi --include=scripts managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-scripts

chezmoi --include=symlinks managed 
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-symlinks

-- golden/managed --
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.ssh
$HOME${/}.ssh/config
$HOME${/}.symlink
-- golden/managed-all --
$HOME${/}.absent
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.ssh
$HOME${/}.ssh/config
$HOME${/}.symlink
$HOME${/}script
-- golden/managed-absent --
$HOME${/}.absent
-- golden/managed-dirs --
$HOME${/}.ssh
-- golden/managed-files --
$HOME${/}.bashrc
$HOME${/}.ssh/config
-- golden/managed-scripts --
$HOME${/}script
-- golden/managed-symlinks --
$HOME${/}.symlink
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_absent --
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_ssh/config --
# contents of .ssh/config
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/run_script --
#!/bin/sh

echo script
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/symlink_dot_symlink --
symlink-linkname
